text: Jehad
You have reclaimed sacred Arabyan ground, the people rejoice and flock to join your armies.
Holy Warriors
These mighty warriors have reclaimed sacred Arabyan land, they are lauded as heroes and blessed by the gods.
This region is sacred to Arabyans!
Holy Arabyan Ground
Tutankhanut's Blessings
You have claimed this land in Tutankhanut's name, this pleases him.
Grand Bombards stand ready to lay ruin on enemy walls.
Entrenched Grand Bombards
Araby Prejudice
Araby holds ancient bonds and hatreds though they have mellowed with time.
Of Dune and Crypt
The Scythans were once a nomadic people but now serve and defend the deserts of the Tomb Kings to the east.
Of Magic and Coin
Long thought dead, Jaffar has arisen through some nefarious way and taken back power ushering in a new age of magic and trade.
Of Sea and Sand
Led by the seafaring Golden Magus these veteran sailors have been far and wide in search of gold and glory.
Allows the [[img:icon_pirate_crew]][[/img]]pirate crew to construct ship buildings and recruit units directly to the vessel.
Stance: Flagship Expansion
Sets up a defensive camp, enabling shipbuilding, recruitment and replenishment regardless of territory.
Stance: Encamp
